articles.title: ‘Death of the suit’: V&A exhibition explores evolution of menswear - The Guardian
articles.description: From Harry Styles in a dress to gender-neutral dressing and ‘dad bods’, Fashioning Masculinities embraces past and present trends
articles.content: From the death of the suit during the pandemic to Harry Styles appearing on the cover of US Vogue in a dress, the conversations around masculinity and fashion appear to be contemporary, however a new… [+3968 chars]

articles.title: Queen heartbreak as she will 'no longer' carry out work as she would want to - Express
articles.description: THE QUEEN will 'no longer' be able to carry out as many physical engagements as she would want to, according to reports.

articles.author: Sarah Vine
articles.title: SARAH VINE: It's toxic femininity to treat men as sex objects - Daily Mail
articles.description: SARAH VINE: I assume Rebel Wilson was going for a Ricky Gervais-at-the-Oscars sort of vibe. Trouble is, Gervais is clever as well as funny. But she isn't.
articles.content:
And the award for most tasteless joke at the BAFTAs goes to... Rebel Wilson, for the one about the biggest prize British cinema has to offer being 'a go' on Tom Hiddleston.
